title: Smoking and Cancer Probability
question_text:
The relationship between smoking and cancer is well known.
In a particular state’s population, the following probabilities have been ascertained:
A person is randomly selected from this population. The individual is a smoker.
What is the probability that the individual has been diagnosed with cancer?
